Lyric:
[by:鱼之骨]
[ti:0]
[ar:0]
[al:0]
[by:0]
[offset:0]
[00:16.65]We were both young when I first saw you
[00:20.22]I close my eyes and the flashback starts I'm standing there
[00:27.14]On a balcony in summer air
[00:32.58]See the lights, see the party, the ball gowns
[00:37.05]See you make your way through the crowd and say hello
[00:43.34]Little did I know
[00:46.04]
[00:47.94]That you were Romeo, you were throwing pebbles
[00:51.65]And my daddy said stay away from Juliet
[00:55.60]And I was crying on the staircase, begging you please don't go
[01:02.95]And I said
[01:04.54]Romeo take me somewhere we can be alone
[01:08.49]I'll be waiting, all there's left to do is run
[01:12.46]You'll be the prince and I'll be this princess
[01:16.57]It's a love story Baby, just say yes
[01:20.86]
[01:24.15]So I sneak out to the garden to see you
[01:28.33]We keep quiet 'cause we're dead if they knew
[01:31.77]So close your eyes
[01:34.98]Escape this town for a little while
[01:38.29]Oh, oh, oh
[01:40.22]'Cause you were Romeo, I was a scarlet letter
[01:44.12]And my daddy said stay away from Juliet
[01:47.91]But you were everything to me, I was begging you please don't go
[01:55.24]And I said
[01:56.73]Romeo take me somewhere we can be alone
[02:00.78]I'll be waiting, all there's left to do is run
[02:04.72]You'll be the prince and I'll be this princess
[02:08.84]It's a love story Baby, just say yes
[02:12.76]Romeo save me , they try to tell me how it feels
[02:17.16]This love is difficult, but it's real
[02:22.23]Don't be afraid , we'll get out of this mess
[02:26.29]It's a love story Baby, just say yes
[02:30.64]
[02:33.70]Oh, oh, oh
[02:35.92]
[02:44.81]I got tired of waiting
[02:48.53]Wondering if you were ever coming around
[02:52.38]My faith in you was fading
[02:57.35]When I met you on the outskirts of town
[03:00.60]And I said
[03:01.79]Romeo save me, I've been feeling so alone.
[03:05.80]I keep waiting for you but you never come
[03:09.74]Is this in my head? I don't know what to think
[03:13.30]He knelt to the groud and pulled out a ring and said
[03:17.82]Marry me ,Juliet
[03:19.84]You'll never have to be alone
[03:21.87]I love you and that's all I really know
[03:25.94]I talked to your dad, go pick out a white dress
[03:29.99]It's a love story Baby, just say yes
[03:36.77]
[03:37.30]Oh, oh, oh
[03:39.46]
[03:41.17]Oh, oh, oh
[03:44.15]
[03:45.90]Cause we were both young when I first saw you
